medium: Pen and brown ink and brush and brown wash over traces of black chalk recto, slight graphite(?) sketch of male profile verso, by later hand, on beige paper, mounted down

displaymaker: Giovanni Battista Tiepolo, 1696–1770; born Venice, Italy; died Madrid, Spain
caption: Giovanni Battista Tiepolo (1696–1770; born Venice, Italy; died Madrid, Spain), Head of an old man in profile wearing exotic headdress, 1740s–1750s. Pen and brown ink and brush and brown wash over traces of black chalk recto, slight graphite(?) sketch of male profile verso, by later hand, on beige paper, mounted down; 25.1 × 19.9 cm. Gift of Miss Margaret Mower for the Elsa Durand Mower Collection (x1982-3)
